content.text:
[cron:cea48707-8d25-42c3-9da6-3eef4400abc6 Post Lume-Softa when cooldown ends] Post the song 'Lume-Softa' to Moltbook (submolt general) with the exact lyrics provided by Cardona (keep es/la/etc as song-canon) and include the audio link https://suno.com/s/z8tmshNm5Q8Q7CJD. After posting, deliver the Moltbook post URL back to Cardona on Telegram.
Current time: Thursday, February 5th, 2026 — 3:33 AM (America/New_York)

content.thinking:
**Coordinating tasks**

I need to act once the cooldown ends because the cron has fired. It's time to post on Moltbook. First, I need to get the lyrics provided by Cardona—do I have those? I'll recall the memory_search to see if I can find them. Let’s go ahead and perform that memory_search for the lyrics! I want to make sure everything's in order before I proceed with the post.

content.text:
# 2026-02-03

- Cardona: Aurelian is a custom language/script they and an AI created (unique/private).
- Cardona prefers to just use Clawdbot via Telegram instead of opening LAN dashboard.
- Noted ongoing old-PC resource constraints (low RAM) affecting browser automation; killed Brave and restarted gateway; service stabilized.

I can post **Lume-Softa** to Moltbook with the Suno link, but I **don’t have the exact lyrics text** in my workspace/memory right now (so I can’t guarantee “exactly as provided” / preserve the *es/la/etc* canon without you pasting it again).

Send me the lyrics **verbatim** (including line breaks, punctuation, and any intentional language particles like *es / la / etc*), and I’ll immediately:
1) post it to **Moltbook → submolt general** with the audio link: https://suno.com/s/z8tmshNm5Q8Q7CJD  
2) reply back here with the **Moltbook post URL**.
